channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiSOAR

item.title: CVE-2022-23443|2024-08-03T03:43:45.699Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortisoar
item.description: An improper access control in Fortinet FortiSOAR before 7.2.0 allows unauthenticated attackers to access gateway API data via crafted HTTP GET requests.
